abstracts.cdata!:
The project would assist MOPCU to build
            up its new organization and continue the rehabilitation of
            its road network begun under the ongoing First Roads Project
            and address important institution building objectives in the
            transport sector.The principal components of the project
            are: (a) rehabilitation of about 500 km of roads; (b)
            establishment of a routine maintenance service; (c)
            training; (d) improvement of the ferry service at key
            crossings; and (e) assistance with management of the sector
            to MTT and MOPCU.The project would benefit the country by
            reopening roads neglected since independence, and by
            reducing transport costs on 500 km of roads.
